Research grants are sorted by the name, shown in <b>bold</b> type, of the (local) principal investigator and co-investigator(s). *Amount of award shown is amount awarded as of December 1997. <P> <!-- 500-1398-3272 --> <b>Alberto Apostolico</b>.
